subject: Why can not backup in Samba3.0.25?
body:
Dear all:
    How do you do.I am now using the Samba3.0.25 as the file server.When I backup
files  
from the Vista and Win2003 to the Samba Server.It can not proceed!But it succeed
when in WinXP.
    Why ?Please help me.
    Many thanks to you.

                                  yours Jian Liang
